source_item.name: Greater Rune of the Void Ritual

effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to hit a Jackpot! that summons a Fire Elemental for 6.0 sec. Casting Ascendance always hits a Jackpot!
Set: When you summon or extend your Fire Elemental, your Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning, and Lava Burst deal 30% increased damage for 8 sec.

spells.description: Equip: Your damaging spells and abilities have a chance to deal 99,258 damage to your target. The magic school chosen is based upon your selection of socketed Khaz Algar gems.

Use: Removes all movement impairing effects and all effects which cause loss of control of your character. (2 Min Cooldown)

effects.display_string: Set: Increases your Intellect by 12% and your Stamina by 10% when in Arenas, Battlegrounds, and War Mode.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells and abilities have a chance to grant 7,831 primary stat for 20 sec.
